name: StickFast: Be Speed
description:
StickFast: Be Speed is a shooting platforming game about being speed. Your objective is to complete the course as fast as possible while keeping it stylish! 

The game was created for Juice Jam in 8 days. Have fun and please leave some honest feedback, everything will be appreciated!

Art, design and code by me
Music and most sound effects by: CrossedKiller

CrossedKiller's references:
https://www.crossedkiller.com/
https://crossedkiller.itch.io/
